body.name: PajamaJeans Boyfriend Jeans For Women - Elastic Waist Jeans
features: Relaxed fit - These blue jeans are made for the days when your skinnies just won't cut it; featuring a relaxed fit and super-soft and stretchy Dormisoft Denim for amazing comfort
Super comfortable & flattering - Elastic waist jeans feature a hidden drawstring and a modest mid-rise, plus a faux fly to feel like pajamas but look like your best pair of casual jeans
Designer details - Features five-pocket designer styling, contrast stitching, and brass rivets, creating the look of expensive designer jeans with all the comfort of PJs
Easy to wear - Pull-up jeans for women have a relaxed, pajama-like feel, so you get a stylish fit without the tugging, stretching, and sucking in of traditional denim
Made for quality - Won't fade or sag, no matter how often you wear them; stretchy jeans constructed from long-lasting Dormisoft Denim

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #49,497 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #397 in Women's Jeans

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The right fit is everything, and PajamaJeans fit every body! PajamaJeans boyfriend jeans are made for those days when the curve-hugging styles of just won't cut it. The most comfortable jeans for women, they feature a relaxed, unrestrictive fit so you can move with ease! Like all PajamaJeans styles, these wide leg jeans for women are made with the comfiest Dormisoft Denim construction, so they slip on and slip off without fuss. The best in ladies jeans, they'll keep their shape, free of sagging and fading, no matter how many times you wash them and wear them. These stretchy jeans are available in regular and plus size jeans sizes so you'll always find the perfect fit. Stretch denim made of Dormisoft Denim (77% Cotton, 21% Polyester, 2% Rayon) Stretch jeans have great give, but will never lose their shape Inseam: 26'' when rolled twice (29'' full length) Front rise: 9.5''; Back rise: 13.5'' Boyfriend pull on jeans have a hidden drawstring for a smooth, custom fit Five-pocket styling Faux fly Brass rivets Machine washable Imported Faux fly Take out the guesswork! With just a few minutes and a measuring tape, you'll find your perfect size. You're just inches away from an impeccable fit. If you find you are measuring between two sizes, we recommend going up to the next size to fit your largest measurement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jeans With An Almost Perfect Fit..But, I'm Short 😉
reviews.reviewText: I ordered an 18wp (womans petite). Being rather short (5',3") & still dropping the lbs, the fit was iffy no matter how I looked at it ... However, to my great suprise, the fit was almost perfect :)... The waist sits just above the belly-botton. On my frame the length is a bit long & requires turning the pant leg, with a 2' cuff twice. There is no bunching at the waist or any place else.AND these Jeans have 5 pockets 🌟! With the minor exception of the pant leg length (mine are going to be shortened tomorrow) these are without a doubt the most comfortable and easy to wear jeans I've worn in years.. I'm planning on purchasing several additional pairs when I can wear a smaller size... If I could, I'd happily give my PajamaJeans Woman's Stretch Jeans at least 10 to 12 stars. I hope this information helps you with your shopping decisions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best jeans I have ever owned--but ONLY the Boyfriend length worked for my 5'3" legs
reviews.reviewText: According to my Amazon order history, it took me trying and returning 13 pairs of jeans before I finally found a pair that fit like I wanted! I am 180# and 5"3" and I loathe skinny jeans. I think the tight ankles makes everyone look like an ice cream cone, and I definitely don't think they flatter me. I want jeans that don't drag on the ground, and I actually have grown a bit tired of jean zippers bunching up when I sit or squat. My search history is littered with "18 Short elastic waist straight leg jeans" and I have tried them all. I even tried a pair of standard Pajama jeans that were skinny legged and too long. The Pajama jean petites didn't fit because I am not short waisted, just short legged. Then THESE came in the mail....and I fell in love! Ordered 4 pairs immediately! With the rolled cuff, they are perfect! Flattering, comfortable, and wonderful looking! I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not booty friendly
reviews.reviewText: I currently wear anything from M to XL in straight size stretchy pants, so for my first try with these, I went with L. Those almost fit, but it was just a bit too much work to get them over my belly, so I returned them and tried XL. XL fit my belly great, but they were weirdly tight in the butt! I have always had a booty, and I've been really working on my fitness this year, and doing a lot of squats. That's actually what led me to try these. I realize skinny jeans are passé but I was still wearing them, right up until my growing muscles started making them fit a little more like a denim prison than anything else. The Pajama Jeans felt great on my legs. I will give them that. I'm also only 4'11", and the inseam (with cuffs rolled) was perfect for me. But the butt was just too tight, and my husband confirmed that it looked weird from behind in addition to feeling weird. The entire point of these was to be comfortable. I accepted defeat and am sending them back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great - with caveat. Not for all body types
reviews.reviewText: For the most part these jeans are great. They’re soft and stretchy and truly do look like typical jeans. However, not totally suitable for my body type. I’m definitely a pear shape - high set/wide/flat rear end and carry my weight around my hips and lower abdomen with no real defined waist. These jeans are very comfortable but as someone who’s short (5’3) and carries all my weight around my hips and lower abdomen I’m used to wearing high waisted jeans so they don’t gap or slide down in the back when sitting. These jeans don’t offer that luxury. Even with the drawstring tightened (which is uncomfortable in order to avoid the gap) the jeans still slide down tremendously when sitting. Not all the way, but they definitely don’t stay put. The front and everything else is great comfort wise but having to hike them up makes them look awful… I would like to see a high waist option for those of us who have this common problem.The size is true I’m not sure about stretching out as I haven’t worn them long but overall I’ll continue to wear them. I don’t think they’re worth the price though, not when there are other options that offer more inclusive cuts - they’re not “spectacular” by any means on my body type but they’re great for what they are and pass off as real jeans easily. I just think the price is too steep and wish there was a high waist option. I can tell these are going to get slightly uncomfortable after a long wear because of the slipping in the back which causes pressure on the front and sides. Use your own judgement, but if you’re built like I am; be aware and buy with a bit of caution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly when first washed, but stretches out a great deal
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited about my two pairs of these at first. They were super comfortable and flattering. However, they stretch out a great deal, very quickly to the point that they are almost unwearable. That means they won't work for travel, as they were supposed to do. Other jeans can be worn many times without that happening. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are just as comfortable as yoga pants!
reviews.reviewText: They are just as comfortable as yoga pants!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No in between sizing like a medium to an xxl

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They fit comfortably. They look great on. I ordered two pair.
Fit as expected & actually look like jeans!

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable like pajamas, looks like jeans
reviews.reviewText: Love that they are mid rise with no uncomfortable zipper to dig in while sitting. No one can even tell they are not technically jeans.... I have five different pairs, styles, colours I wear to work ever day.....every pair cute, comfortable and stylish.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice for the slimmer ones.
reviews.reviewText: The jean material is very nice. These jeans did not fit me properly because IThey were too small.
